name: DeleteRemoteDesktopSecurityConfiguration
description: Delete remoteDesktopSecurityConfiguration. Delete a remoteDesktopSecurityConfiguration object on a servicePrincipal. Removing remoteDesktopSecurityConfiguration object on the servicePrincipal disables the Microsoft Entra ID Remote Desktop Services (RDS) authentication protocol to authenticate a user to Microsoft Entra joined or Microsoft Entra hybrid joined devices, and removes any target device groups that you configured for SSO.
